question:
Consider the following statements about the National Ganga River Basin Project:
  1. The project is being funded by the World Bank
  2. Government has set up an internationally recognised institute called Ganga Knowledge Center for operationalizing the project
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The National Ganga River Basin Project is being funded by the World Bank. The World Bank is supporting to build the NGRBA institutions at the national and state levels to monitor the Ganga clean-up programme. Also World Bank is financing certain selective investment projects in wastewater collection and treatment, especially industrial effluents and solid waste management. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. Ganga Knowledge Centre (GKC) is an internationally recognised institute set up by the government to conduct the targeted research to facilitate basin-scale decision making and mapping the entire basin with help of GIS.
